description: This file defines a function to fetch and process top stories from Hacker News using the httpx library, and initializes an Agent with this function as a tool to generate a summary of top stories.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class imported from agno.agent, used to create an agent that can utilize tools and interact via print_response.

methods.name: get_top_hackernews_stories
methods.description: Fetches the top stories from Hacker News, retrieves their details, removes the 'text' field if present, and returns a JSON string of the stories.
